oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Groups in which every non-abelian subgroup is self-centralizing
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Delizia, Costantino
Dietrich, Heiko
Moravec, Primoz
Nicotera, Chiara
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Group Theory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study groups having the property that every non-abelian subgroup contains its centralizer. We describe various classes of infinite groups in this class, and address a problem of Berkovich regarding the classification of finite $p$-groups with the above property.
